about_the_game:
You are cast in the role of a young boy who starts his adventure on a mysterious and vast green landscape. You know that your destination is straight ahead. You know what that destination is. But not much else... You travel across the vast and diverse lands ahead of you, as you gradually evolved from a little boy in a big world. This little boy's equipment consists of a sword and a pair of boots - gifted to him by his Papa, as well as a cape and shield - gifted to him by his Mama. He is also accompanied by his faithful guide, Pavi.

  • Pseudo-open world action adventure with a huge world to explore
  • Defeat various foes on your journey
  • Encounter the mysterious Guardians, who will test your abilities and prepare you for the different stages of your journey
  • Diverse environments with diverse enemies
  • Original music that changes with the background and creates an enchanting mood
